name: Spacetime Line
description:
Experience Spacetime in Spacetime Line. Easy to pick up but difficult to master in Spacetime Line simply move around and experience Spacetime. As you move, time will slow down for everything else, and you will exist at multiple points in time. 

Use this to your advantage as you try to match the color of the moving blocks. You will constantly be changing color if you stay still but you stay the same color as you move, and if you can exist at different places at the same time, maybe you can get the upper hand... Good luck!!

Be sure to see in-game instructions for help!

Completed for Trijam 121: Spacetime!
